content: one needle for the heel flap and heel turn n1 and n2 are now the front instep of the sock and n3 will hold the 24 stitches from n3 and n4 row 1 rs *s1 knit wise k1* to end row 2 ws turn work around so now the purl side of n3 is facing you s1 purl wise p to end turn work row 3 rs *s1 knit wise k1* to end turn work row 4 ws s1 purl wise p to end turn work repeat row 3 and 4 above 7 more times for a total of 18 row you will be ending with a purl row turn your work you will start the heel turn with a knit row heel turn the heel turn continues only with the stitches on n3 row 1 rs k 13 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws s1 purl wise p 4 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs s1 knit wise k to one stitch before the gap created when your work was turned on the previous row ssk k1 turn work row 4 ws s1 purl wise p to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn work repeat row 3 and row 4 until you have worked all the stitches you will have 14 stitches left on your needle and you will end with a purl row turn your work and knit across the heel flap n3 placing a stitch marker after 7 stitches which is the halfway point now you re ready to start the heel gusset heel gusset now you ll continue working in the round again with rs of n3 facing you pick up and knit 9 stitches from along the side of the heel flap onto n3 pick up 1 extra stitch at the corner of the instep to eliminate having a small gap in the corner you should now have a total of 24 stitches on n3 continue knitting the sunshine pattern on n1 and n2 picking up where you left off which should be round 2 remember this is the front of the sock or the instep 3 © the kitchen sink shop now you will need the extra needle that you put aside using this needle pick up 1 stitch in the corner of the instep and then pick up 9 stitches along the other edge of the heel flap continue knitting 7 stitches to the marker from old n3 now n4 remove marker using a separate needle knit across n4 you should now have the following number of stitches on each needle n1 12 n2 12 n3 17 n4 17 heel decrease round 1 continue with the texture pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end that is to say do not continue the sunshine pattern on n3 or n4 for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 2 continue with sunshine pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit
